description:
A tried and tested pack, sized for backpacking and gear-intensive multi-sport weekends. The FreeFloat A3 suspension adapts to your body and maintains your centre of gravity through shifting terrain for a smooth, comfortable stride. Multi-density foam in the hipbelt and shoulder straps place padding exactly where you need it, and a mesh back panel supports your back while allowing heat to escape.

  • Steel wire frame is wishbone-shaped to channel the load to the centre and lumbar regions
  • AirCushion Foamless backpanel keeps air flowing and eliminates pressure points
  • Bottom sleeping bag compartment has a removable internal divider
  • Twin side-mounted water bottle holsters are canted for easy access and stow away when not needed
  • Lots of pockets on the front, sides and lid keep you organized
  • Removable shockcord loops hold ice axes or trekking poles
  • Removable, adjustable straps attach at multiple points for lashing on sleeping pads
  • Maximum recommended cargo weight is 23kg
name: Gregory Baltoro 65 Backpack - Unisex
